data.text:
"After months of living together, I would think The Wolverine would let me hit at least once."

That's what Wade thought, at least. He still pondered when he caught the guy debating whether to sleep on the couch or Wade's bed, his brows furrowed so hard people assumed they were stuck like that. That was a month ago, and Wade almost completely forgot about it. (Lie, he saved it in his mind vault for later, and for some reason, it was replaced with a catchy commercial about shoelaces.)

It wasn't only that moment though, smaller ones happened throughout the day so many times it was hard to keep count. Glances, the lingering, Logan drinking from a beer bottle for a little too long while maintaining eye contact, that time when Wade came home late and Logan asked "Where have you been?" like a jealous girlfriend while sitting alone in the dark waiting for him to come home.

"A night on the town, darling, but I'm oh so loyal to you and you only!"

A response met with a beer bottle being thrown at his head.

As Wade went over each little thing, he slowly realized he was getting off track. Logan hadn't fully let any walls down was the main point he could recall. Of course, the basics were set out, boundaries drawn, and Wade was happy with things the way they were. Sometimes they'd even share a hug with only mild casualties.

That's exactly why he was locked in the bathroom stroking his cock at the thought of finally nailing that roommate he longed for (Logan, if it wasn't clear.) He didn't bother using anything except his spit for lubrication, closing his eyes and letting his head fall back while he slipped back into the fantasy. Thankfully he didn't have company to disturb him, everyone was out and busy, leaving him alone to do whatever he wanted. For a second, the isolation tempted him to grab one of the shirts Logan borrowed and hold it in his mouth as a makeshift gag.

Surprisingly, shame smacked him out of it, as well as the whole "boundaries" concept Logan drew out in the first place. That, and the fact Logan would be able to smell whatever stench Wade left behind.

"Fuck! I should've taken a picture when his shirt exploded, but both my hands were occupied. Kind of like now." He sped up his pace, huffing out small curses and shutting his eyes when he was about to cum. "God, I need to get him on his knees one of these days ...with..consent.. of course."

His teeth clenched, and he felt a familiar knot in his stomach, tightening until he was cut off.

The front door slammed open, heavy footsteps creaking the floors as they stomped in the direction of the kitchen. Wade froze, one hand squeezing his length while the other put itself over his mouth. The merc had no idea why he was scared of Logan hearing him, he'd been caught multiple times already and had claws sink into his chest every single time without fail.

Maybe scared wasn't the right term, maybe it was the thrill of being caught again, or the temptation to edge until he got a chance to burst later. His thoughts were cut through like butter when he heard the gruff voice on the other side of the door.

"Get the fuck outta there before I break down the door." His threat was strengthened by a hard knock, his voice unwavering. "I'm not kiddin'."

"Occupied! Wait your turn, sweetums! Once daddy is done making love to the seat, you can have her all to yourself, trust me!" Wade sang, earning claws through the door as a reply. "Hey, if you gotta pee, you can just do it in front of me, I don't care. I mean personally, it might get arousing...unless you're not into that. We're both manly men here. No homo, bro."

Apparently, that was a line crossed, and Wade sighed as the door was forced open with Logan as the culprit, busting in while covered in gore. Caught with his pants down again, he marked that that was the twenty-second time it happened. A flash of shock crossed Logan's face, then confusion, then acceptance.

"I'm not even gonna touch ya this time. Get up and get out."

"What if I want you to touch me?" Wade grinned, taking his hand off his dick to beckon the other man over. "I got blue balls over here, oh so blue. Daddy needs sweet release-"

"Not in a million fuckin' years you degenerate fuck."

Logan growled, gripping the sides of the sink as he avoided eye contact with the other man. For some reason, there was a sort of faltering, hesitance in his words when he spoke.

"We live forever babygirl, that's a date!" The rejection stung, as it always did, but he took it on the cheek. "You can deepthroat that bottle all you want but it doesn't compare to the real thing. I assure you."

It almost made him explode on the spot the way Logan side-eyed him, low rumbling in his throat as the claws slid out. They weren't out all the way, and they didn't need to be.

"Yeah? You'd bet money on that, Bub?" Wade found himself being stared down, Logan's eyes trailing to below his stomach before darting away. "Forget it."

"Bingo! So you do wanna blow me, you're just scared of this situationship gettin' to the next level." Wade snapped his fingers with a weirdly moist sound, making Logan scoff and grimace. "First comes blowjobs, then comes love, then comes marriage, then comes a poolverine love baby in a baby carriage."

It was almost too obvious when claws sunk themselves into his head, ripped out, then sunk again. Blood splattered onto the wall and the floor, it mixed with the gore The Wolverine brought in, making a horrible mess of old and new carnage. Wade laughed when the claws left, his head slumping before making some cracking noises and bouncing back up. He then realized what Logan went in there for: A shower. If the guy asked, Wade would lick the grime and flesh off of him like he was covered in ambrosia.

One bloody boot made a home beside his shoulder, coating the wall in even more filth.

"You want this, bubba?" Logan growled out, teeth gritted and claws caging Wade in.

Wade swore his cock twitched.

"Oh god, yes! What the hell? Only an idiot would say No to that question, or someone who isn't into men. I gotta hand it to you though it'd be hard for me to not look at your ass once in a while even if I was on the straight and narrow."

As if. Wade's mind was full of a million tiny voices both telling him to jump the man who had his leg up in just the perfect position...with a tiny chorus shouting "No!" and god he was so sad that the tiny chorus was smarter than the tiny voices.

"Hey, can you blow me? Serious question, not a funny joke, no cameras."

His eyes looked into the distance, much to Logan's disappointment.

"Except for that one, keep your hands away from your zipper, sicko."

It went dead quiet as neither of them said a word, and Logan stood up. For a second, Deadpool thought he was right and the man was out of his mind, only to have that thought thrown out of the window when Logan closed and locked the bathroom door.

"Is this the part where you tear me limb from limb and nobody finds the body?" Wade smiled. "Joking. The baby limbs would kill the mood."

Logan rolled his eyes, and Wade could sense that every bone in his body wanted him to stab his dick and stomp off to down a bottle of whiskey. Or maybe it was something entirely different. Wade wanted so badly to peel every layer of Logan back to see what was really under the surface, and then crawl inside and make a home there.

"No. This is the part where I tell you: I'm not gonna play your fuckin' games." Logan spat blood into the sink, wiping his mouth afterward. "If you want it you can have it, bub. Don't fuckin' ruin this or I'll chop your dick off."

"Oh, I'm so honored! I'm guessin' you're not a virgin? Wolverine cherry popped? Not callin' you a slut of course....unless you wanna be called one."
